data.title: Ziegfeld Follies of 1908 – Broadway Musical – Original
data.meta_description: Ziegfeld Follies of 1908 (Original, Musical, Revue, Broadway) opened in New York City Jun 15, 1908 and played through Sep 26, 1908.
data.text:
Conceived and produced by Florenz Ziegfeld, Jr.

Music by Maurice Levi; Sketches and lyrics by Harry B. Smith; Featuring songs by Albert Von Tilzer; Featuring songs with lyrics by Jack Norworth; Featuring "The Taxicab" by Melville Gideon; Featuring "The Taxicab" by Edgar Selden; Featuring "When the Girl You Love is Loving You" by Jean Schwartz; Featuring "When the Girl You Love is Loving You" by William Jerome; Musical Director: Frederic Solomon

Ensemble numbers produced by Julian Mitchell; Principals directed by Herbert Gresham

You Will Have to Sing an Irish Song

(music by Albert Von Tilzer; lyrics by Jack Norworth)

Nothing Ever Troubles Me (Nothing Ever Ever Ever Hardly Ever Troubles Me)

(music by Albert Von Tilzer; lyrics by Jack Norworth)

The Taxicab (Take Me Round in a Taxi)

(music by Melville Gideon; lyrics by Edgar Selden)
